DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether sucrose v high fructose corn syrup soft drink result differences various metabolic byproduct fructose , glucose , serum uric acid , triglyceride lactate .
DOC.detailed_description: Fructose consumption rise sharply past several decade . Since introduction United States 1967 , high fructose corn syrup ( HFCS ) overtake sucrose main sweetener manufacture food beverage , thus , responsible approximately 30 % increase fructose diet . Numerous study show excessive fructose consumption cause variety harmful metabolic effect , suggest fructose may partially responsible current epidemic obesity , hypertension , metabolic syndrome , diabetes . This preliminary study investigate pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics fructose broad population . Specifically , goal research compare impact two main source dietary fructose , sucrose versus HFCS , fructose bioavailability acute metabolic change measure response phenotype , serum uric acid , lactate , triglyceride level .
DOC.criteria: adult subject age 18 year old either gender ethnicity willing abstain drinking alcohol 3 day prior study visit history liver kidney disease history diabetes mellitus fast blood glucose ≥ 126 mg/dl random blood glucose ≥ 200 mg/dl currently take medication ( except oral contraceptive ) consume 1 alcoholic drink per day pregnant breastfeeding blood donor previous 8 week history gout
